overview: This Short film CGI Animation, The Escape, takes place in the distant future after the invention of a teleportation device leading to another dimension. In The Escape, the heroin of this short film, Eliana, has stolen the device. With the police hot in pursuit behind her, she enters an alley attempting to get away, only to find herself at a dead end.
tagline: Action takes place in distant future. Eliana has stolen the mysterious teleportation device and activated it being surrounded by police.
title: The Escape
